text: Chris Cornell left behind an incredibly diverse and powerful body of work, spanning Soundgarden, Temple of the Dog, Audioslave and his solo music. That legacy is getting the career - retrospective treatment with a new collection titled simply and fittingly Chris Cornell. The compilation will come in two forms — a 17 - track album and a massive 64 - track limited deluxe box set — and covers all the aforementioned projects, including previously unreleased material ( 11 tracks worth, on the box - set edition ) such as the newly unveiled song ` ` When Bad Does Good,'' which you stream above. Chris Cornell is due November 16th ( you can be pre - order it here ) and marks the first release under the singer's name since the his death in May 2017. ` ` When Bad Does Good'' was produced, recorded and
